title: External respiration
brief_description: Illustrates and discusses, by means of animated diagrams, the passage of air from the nose to lungs, the function of the nasal passages, trachea, thorax, diaphragm and lungs, transference of oxygen to the bloodstream and the expulsion of surplus carbon-dioxide during expiration.
